title: I propose a new game mode between the lower elo players and high elo.
body:
The idea is simple, the mode has 5 players ranging from bronze MMR to gold MMR on one team.

The other team gets 1 plat~challenger player + 4 beginner bots.

For every premade member, the high elo team gets an intermediate bot instead.

Let the games begin. :^)

replies.body: I would just tell my team to 5-man gank the human over and over.
IMO this game mode should inherently have higher winrate (65%?) for the low elo team, because it teaches them teamwork. While it teaches the high elo how to snowball and punish mistakes harder.
Make it bronze/silver, exclude high gold, so that the lonesome high elo player has a chance

Where do these guys get to play though? There has to be a cutoff point lol

It doesn't have to be a specific rank, say 1700 MMR; if you're under it, you play with 4 other people. If you're above, you're the "raid boss". ( you can somewhat calculate MMR on op.gg and lolking right now, in case you're wondering )

There can be a formula for gold income: If 5 players' MMR is 3 times higher than the enemy, he gets 1.5x gold income.

This can be further balanced with experimentation, if the solo player winrate turns out to be low then they can buff the gold income number/multiplication cap from 3 -> 2.5 and so forth. :)
